page.title: 13Schools 2
page.content: At the Junior School in Alexandra Road Mr Bayliss and his 22 teachers teach 460 pupils between the ages of 7 and 11.There is also a unit for pupils with learning difficulties.There is a full curriculum and many lunchtime and after school clubs. There are over 1400 pupils and 79 full time staff at the Grove Comprehensive School.First years are on a separate site in Frogmore Road.At the beginning the children are arranged in mixed ability tutor groups and set for academic work. A wide range of CSEs and O levels are offered. Over 100 sixth formers are housed in the old Grove House. There are specialist areas for science, domestic science, craft, sport, music and drama.The school has an outdoor pursuit centre in the Lake District purchased by the P.T.A. at a cost of Â£40,000.
